publication.title: Exposure of Mycobacterium marinum to low-shear modeled microgravity: effect on growth, the transcriptome and survival under stress

treatments.duration: 40 hours or 4 days followed by re-dilution and growth for ~35 hours

results.effect: LSMMG induced a reduction in bacterial growth compared to NG cultures
LSMMG affected the size of bacteria
RNA-Seq detected significantly altered transcript levels for 562 and 328 genes under LSMMG after short and long exposure times, respectively.
LSMMG increased oxidative stress resistance of M. marinum but decreased resistance to other stresses like acid or heat shock.
